summary: Ivan Marti is identified as the brother of Manuel Marti. He is mentioned in the context of local agency checks conducted by the FBI in San Juan, Puerto Rico, alongside his sister Blanca Marti, as part of background investigations related to Manuel Marti. One document notes that Ivan Marti was a subscriber to "New Horizons for Youth." The documents suggest that the FBI was investigating the Marti family, possibly due to Manuel Marti's activities or associations, leading them to gather information on his siblings.
significance: Ivan Marti's significance in the JFK context appears to be indirect. He is mentioned as a relative of Manuel Marti, who was under investigation. His subscription to "New Horizons for Youth" may have been a point of interest for the FBI, potentially linking him to certain ideologies or groups relevant to the investigation, though the exact nature of this connection is not detailed in the provided documents.
